1.name: The Night of the Hunter
1.description: A religious fanatic marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real daddy hid $10,000 he'd stolen in a robbery.

2.name: East of Eden
2.description: A wilful young man contends against his brother for the attention of their religious father while reconnecting with his estranged mother and falling for his brother's girlfriend.

3.name: To Catch a Thief
3.description: A retired jewel thief sets out to prove his innocence after being suspected of returning to his former occupation.

4.name: The Man from Laramie
4.description: A stranger, Will Lockhart, defies the local cattle baron and his sadistic son by working for one of his oldest rivals.

5.name: Hit the Deck
5.description: Sailor Danny Xavier Smith and two other gobs try to save his sister Susan's virtue. She wants to get a role in the show "Hit the Deck". After wrecking the producers hotel suite, they land ...                See full summary »

6.name: Rebel Without a Cause
6.description: A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.

7.name: Lady and the Tramp
7.description: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

8.name: Oklahoma!
8.description: In Oklahoma, several farmers, cowboys and a traveling salesman compete for the romantic favors of various local ladies.

9.name: Guys and Dolls
9.description: In New York, a gambler is challenged to take a cold female missionary to Havana, but they fall for each other, and the bet has a hidden motive to finance a crap game.

10.name: The Seven Year Itch
10.description: When his family goes away for the summer, a so far faithful husband is tempted by a beautiful neighbor.

11.name: We're No Angels
11.description: Three Devil's Island escapees hide out in the house of a kindly merchant and repay his kindness by helping him and his family out of several crises.

12.name: This Island Earth
12.description: Aliens come to Earth seeking scientists to help them in their war.

13.name: Summertime
13.description: A lonely American woman unexpectedly finds romance in Venice, Italy.

14.name: Diabolique
14.description: The wife and mistress of a loathed school principal hatch a plan to murder him while having the perfect alibi. They carry out the plan...but then his body disappears.

15.name: The Trouble with Harry
15.description: The trouble with Harry is that he's dead, and everyone seems to have a different idea of what should be done with his body.

16.name: The Ladykillers
16.description: Five diverse oddball criminal types planning a bank robbery rent rooms on a cul-de-sac from an octogenarian widow under the pretext that they are classical musicians.

17.name: Pather Panchali
17.description: Impoverished priest Harihar Ray, dreaming of a better life for himself and his family, leaves his rural Bengal village in search of work.

18.name: Killer's Kiss
18.description: Ready to catch a train to his hometown, a washed up boxer tells us about the strange and twisty events that happened to him the past couple of days.

19.name: Kiss Me Deadly
19.description: A doomed female hitchhiker pulls Mike Hammer into a deadly whirlpool of intrigue, revolving around a mysterious "great whatsit".

20.name: Marty
20.description: A middle-aged butcher and a school teacher who have given up on the idea of love meet at a dance and fall for each other.

21.name: The Indian Fighter
21.description: A scout leading a wagon train through hostile Indian country unwittingly gets involved with a Sioux chief's daughter.

22.name: Bad Day at Black Rock
22.description: A one-armed stranger comes to a tiny town possessing a terrible past they want to keep secret, by violent means if necessary.

23.name: Tarantula
23.description: A spider escapes from an isolated Arizona desert laboratory experimenting in giantism and grows to tremendous size as it wreaks havoc on the local inhabitants.

24.name: Revenge of the Creature
24.description: Men capture the creature from the Black Lagoon and make him an aquarium attraction, from which he escapes.

25.name: The Court Jester
25.description: A hapless carnival performer masquerades as the court jester as part of a plot against an evil ruler who has overthrown the rightful king.

26.name: Rififi
26.description: Four men plan a technically perfect crime, but the human element intervenes...

27.name: Sissi
27.description: In the first of a trilogy of movies about Elisabeth "Sissi" of Austria, the young vibrant princess catches the eye of her sister's fiancé, Emperor Franz Josef.

28.name: PT Raiders
28.description: A trio of ex-servicemen begin smuggling innocuous black market items into post-war Britain, but through greed they graduate to more sinister cargo.

29.name: The Dam Busters
29.description: The story of how the British attacked German dams in WWII by using an ingenious technique to drop bombs where they would be most effective.

30.name: Mister Roberts
30.description: In the waning days of World War II, the United States Navy cargo ship Reluctant and her crew are stationed in the "backwater" areas of the Pacific Ocean. Trouble ensues when the crew members are granted liberty.

31.name: All That Heaven Allows
31.description: An upper-class widow falls in love with a much younger, down-to-earth nurseryman, much to the disapproval of her children and criticism of her country club peers.

32.name: Land of the Pharaohs
32.description: A captured architect designs an ingenious plan to ensure the impregnability of tomb of a self-absorbed Pharaoh, obsessed with the security of his next life.

33.name: It's a Great Day!
33.description: Bob Grove, a builder has problems with the council, over building supplies that he needs to complete a job on a local housing estate. Under pressure to finish the job, his son gets them ...                See full summary »

34.name: Ordet
34.description: Follows the lives of the Borgen family, as they deal with inner conflict, as well as religious conflict with each other, and the rest of the town.

35.name: Bride of the Monster
35.description: A mad doctor attempts to create atomic supermen.

36.name: La Pointe Courte
36.description: There are two parts to this film: sequences of life in the fishing village of La Pointe Courte (a government inspector's visit, the death of a child) alternate with others following a ...                See full summary »

37.name: The Man with the Golden Arm
37.description: A strung-out junkie deals with a demoralizing drug addiction while his crippled wife and card sharks pull him down.

38.name: The Big Combo
38.description: A police lt. is ordered to stop investigating deadly crime boss Mr. Brown, because he hasn't been able to get any hard evidence against him. He then goes after Brown's girlfriend who despises him, for information instead.

39.name: Richard III
39.description: Shakespeare's powerful tale of the wicked deformed King and his conquests, both on the battlefield and in the boudoir.

40.name: Davy Crockett: King of the Wild Frontier
40.description: American frontiersman Davy Crockett fights in the Creek Indian War, is elected to the U.S. Congress and fights for Texas at the Alamo.

41.name: It Came from Beneath the Sea
41.description: A giant, radioactive octopus rises from the Philippine Trench to terrorize the North American Pacific Coast.

42.name: The Last Frontier
42.description: A trapper and his two partners work as scouts for a remote army fort where they witness an incompetent colonel's decision to throw his small unprepared garrison against Red Cloud's sizable Sioux force.

43.name: Smiles of a Summer Night
43.description: In Sweden at the turn of the century, members of the upper class and their servants find themselves in a romantic tangle that they try to work out amidst jealousy and heartbreak.

44.name: Jedda the Uncivilized
44.description: Set against the harsh natural surrounds of outback Northern Territory, Jedda captures a rare and honest glimpse into the heart and history of indigenous Australia. Young Jedda is caught ...                See full summary »

45.name: To Hell and Back
45.description: The true WWII story of Audie Murphy, the most decorated soldier in U.S. history. Based on the autobiography of Audie Murphy who stars as himself in the film.

46.name: My Sister Eileen
46.description: After submitting a story of her beautiful sister, a woman assumes her identity to maintain the attention of a playboy publisher.

47.name: The Desperate Hours
47.description: Three escaped convicts move in on and terrorize a suburban household.

48.name: Strategic Air Command
48.description: An ex-pilot and current baseballer is recalled into the U.S. Air Force and assumes an increasingly important role in Cold War deterrence.

49.name: The Quatermass Xperiment
49.description: Professor Bernard Quatermass' manned rocket ship returns to Earth, but two of the astronauts are missing and the survivor seems ill and unable to communicate.

50.name: Love Me or Leave Me
50.description: A fictionalized account of the career of jazz singer Ruth Etting and her tempestuous marriage to gangster Marty Snyder, who helped propel her to stardom.
